pages.title: Let’s get started! What is the name of your company?
pages.description: For the purpose of industry regulation, your details are required.

pages.title: Great name! What is the address of your company?
pages.description: For the purpose of industry regulation, your details are required.

pages.title: Got it. Enter your influencer details.
pages.description: For the purpose of industry regulation, your details are required.

questions.label: What is the name of the influencer?
questions.name: influencer_name

questions.label: In what state does influencer lives in?
questions.name: influencer_state

pages.title: Very cool. What are the names of the Services you will have the Influencer advertise?
pages.description: Note: here is where you can type in the name of your Services! You can add upto four Services. If you want the influencer to only advertise one service, then just fill first field.

pages.title: Great Services! What are the social media platforms that you want the Influencer to promote the Services on?
pages.description: Note: here is where you can type in the name of the social media platforms (for example, Instagram or Youtube)! Any entry you leave empty will be removed from the contract, so if there’s only one, just type on the first field.

pages.title: When would you like the Influencer to publicize her/his first post?
pages.description: For the purpose of industry regulation, your details are required.

pages.title: Expiration date of this contract.
pages.description: Note: this doesn’t affect how long the posts are required to be on the social media platforms. This only addresses the length of the contract, but does not void the Influencer of its obligations for the length of the social media posts.

questions.label: What would you like the expiration date (end date) of this contract to be?
questions.name: expire_date

pages.title: Would you rather pay the Influencer a flat fee (one time payment) or pay the Influencer in installments, such as weekly, bi-weekly, or monthly?
pages.description: For the purpose of industry regulation, your details are required.

pages.title: Great choice! What is the flat fee that you’ll pay the Influencer?
pages.description: For the purpose of industry regulation, your details are required.

pages.title: Great choice! How often would you like to pay the Influencer?
pages.description: For the purpose of industry regulation, your details are required.

pages.title: Great choice! How much will you pay the Influencer in each of these payments?
pages.description: For the purpose of industry regulation, your details are required.

pages.title: Would you like the relationship to be exclusive?
pages.description:
Note: answering yes will insert a clause called “exclusivity clause.” This means that the Influencer shall only advertise and promote these types of Services, and those similar, for your company only. They are unable to advertise and promote for another company or individual.
Pros: they would be unable to promote your competitor’s Services.
Cons: the influencer may less likely agree to this Agreement since they might feel hamstringed

pages.title: In what state you'd like to form...
pages.description: Helpful tip – parties often decide based on where one of the parties do business

questions.label: Which state’s laws do you want the contract to be governed by?
questions.name: governed_state

questions.label: What state should handle a potential lawsuit?
questions.name: lawsuit_state

pages.title: Would you like to attach an appendix for specific brand guidelines?
pages.description: Schedule B will talk about brand guidelines including desired colors, fonts, or other creative direction. Schedule B will also tell influencers what not to do, like use profane language or show too much skin.You can also describe items to avoid in influencer posts, such as not mentioning specific competitors, which you’ll state by name. Also mention that all blog posts, social media statuses, tweets, and/or comments should be in good taste and free of inappropriate language and/or any content promoting bigotry, racism or discrimination based on race, gender, religion, nationality, disability, sexual orientation, or age.

questions.label: Do you have your own standard guideline you’d like to attach? If no, then we will, on the next page, provide text box for you to type in specific guidelines.
questions.name: our_guidlines
